issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

fields.summary: Cost to choose side table in MapJoin conversion based on cumulative cardinality

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Physical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime

fields.description: This extends HIVE-13096 so the heuristic can take into account top operators that produce large number of rows. In the future, we should choose the side based on total latency for the input.
fields.summary: Account for top operator network cost to choose side table in MapJoin conversion
